mapper.select: SELECT answer_no as answerNo, seq as seq, title, contents, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') END regDt, reg_id as regId FROM answer

SELECT answer_no as answerNo, question_no as questionNo, title, contents, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') END regDt, reg_id as regId FROM answer WHERE answer_no = #{answerNo}

SELECT answer_no as answerNo, seq as seq, title, contents, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') END regDt, reg_id as regId FROM answer WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer ( answer_no, seq, title, contents, reg_dt, reg_id ) VALUES ( #{answerNo}, #{seq}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{regId} )
